es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.distance

Interface ItemDistanceModel<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of the items
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CosineFeatureItemDistanceModel, FeatureItemDistanceModel, JaccardFeatureItemDistanceModel, VectorFeatureItemDistanceModel

    public interface ItemDistanceModel<I>
    Item distance model. S. Vargas. Novelty and diversity evaluation and enhancement in Recommender Systems. PhD Thesis. S. Vargas and P. Castells. Rank and relevance in novelty and diversity for Recommender Systems. RecSys 2011.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

      ToDoubleFunction<I> dist(I i)
      Returns a function that return the distance to the input item.

      Returns the distance between a pair of items.
